## Checklist

- [ ] The tutorial teaches how to build something from scratch (not just using an API/library)
- [ ] The tutorial is freely accessible
- [ ] The link is working and the content is up-to-date
- [ ] Entry follows the format: `* [**Title**](URL) - Description [Language / Framework]`
- [ ] Added to the correct category
- [ ] Not a duplicate of an existing entry
